comment: Please keep your comments to ones that are not hateful to others.
amr:

      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (c / comment-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG2 (c2 / comment-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG3 (o / one
                        :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                              :polarity -
